CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL( QA_Tier_Rating__c , "Tier 1"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3sT", "", 50, 50), IF(ISPICKVAL( QA_Tier_Rating__c , "Major Compliance Breach"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3sT", "", 50, 50),
IF(ISPICKVAL( QA_Tier_Rating__c , "Tier 2"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3vh", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3vh", "", 50, 50),
IF(ISPICKVAL( QA_Tier_Rating__c , "Tier 3"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3yv", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3yv", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F3yv", "", 50, 50),
IF(ISPICKVAL( QA_Tier_Rating__c , "Tier 4"), IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F2ra", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F2ra", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F2ra", "", 50, 50) + " " + IMAGE("/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=015Rz000002F2ra", "", 50, 50), ""
) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: QA Sparks
